labels.analysis: The MCP Server provides tools for accessing web content in a reliable and efficient markdown format. Its core functionality includes unblocking web pages and enabling seamless web searches, which are essential for enhancing agent capabilities. The available tools suggest a focus on web accessibility and content retrieval, making it particularly useful for automation and research purposes.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Web Search & Research" is chosen because the server's primary function involves accessing and retrieving web content, which aligns with the category of information gathering and research. The secondary label "Browser Automation" is included because the unblocking and markdown conversion functionalities imply automated interaction with web pages. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality.

server_info_crawled.name: pure.md MCP server
server_info_crawled.author: @puremd/puremd-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Access web content in markdown format reliably and efficiently. Unblock web pages and search the web seamlessly, enhancing your agents' capabilities. Integrate with your scripts and applications to leverage markdown delivery like a CDN.

tools.name: unblock-url
tools.description: Deploy Server pure.md MCP server @puremd/puremd-mcp Try in Playground unblock-url

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@puremd/puremd-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: puremdApiKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: API key for authenticating with pure.md
